sentences.en: A set of synthetic data is used to illustrate these methods.
sentences.cn: 一组模拟数据被用来说明这些方法.

sentences.en: Boots made from synthetic materials can usually be washed in a machine.
sentences.cn: 合成材料制成的靴子通常可以机洗。

sentences.en: Celluloid resulted from efforts to produce a synthetic horn.
sentences.cn: 制造合成角质的层试,导致了赛璐珞的产生.

sentences.en: Disconnection is the reverse of synthetic steps or reactions.
sentences.cn: 切断是合成步骤或反应之逆.

sentences.en: Latin is a synthetic language, while English is analytic.
sentences.cn: 拉丁文是一种综合性语言, 而英语是一种分析性语言.

sentences.en: Nylon is a synthetic; it is not from nature.
sentences.cn: 尼龙是一种合成纤维, 不是天然物质.

sentences.en: Some of the new synthetic dress materials do not crush.
sentences.cn: 有些新型合成衣料不会起皱.

sentences.en: Synthetic vitamins have established an enviable record in purity of product.
sentences.cn: 合成维生素在产品纯度方面已证实具有出色的记录.

sentences.en: The jellies were topped with suspiciously synthetic blobs of cream.
sentences.cn: 果冻上面是一小团看上去有点怪异的人造奶油。

sentences.en: The majority of synthetic copolymers contain only two types of structural unit.
sentences.cn: 大多数的合成共聚物只有两种形式的结构单元.

sentences.en: The more significant synthetic dividend of this simple process is reaped.
sentences.cn: 可以从这个简单反应中得到在合成上更有意义的收获.

sentences.en: Turnover of cytoplasmic constituents involves both synthetic and lytic processes.
sentences.cn: 细胞质组分的周转既包括合成也包括分解过程.

sentences.en: We felt the salesman's synthetic friendliness.
sentences.cn: 我们感觉到那位销售员的虚情假意.

sentences.en: When the synthetic fabric is contrasted with the natural one, the difference is very apparent.
sentences.cn: 要是把合成纺织品和天然纺织品对比一下, 它们的差别就很明显了.

words.tran_cn: 综合，[化学] 合成；综合体

phrases.tran_cn: n. 人造纤维，合成纤维
合成聚合物；合成高分子

trans.tran_cn: 合成的，人造的，摹拟的，虚构的，[语]综合的
trans.tran_en: produced by combining different artificial substances, rather than being naturally produced

trans.tran_cn: 合成物，合成纤维，合成剂
